poem:
### Echoes of a Broken Morning

Ear bloodied,  
fist raised in defiance  
of chaos— will  
he heal or  
fan the flame?

$35 buys  
a battle cry,  
"Fight! Fight! Fight!"  
etched in  
fabric and fear.

In aftermath,  
we thread our  
questions through  
needles of silence.
